name: slack_send_message
description: Send a message to a Slack channel. You must be logged into your Slack workspace at app.slack.com.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Message text to send (supports Slack markdown)

steps.code: const localConfig = localStorage.getItem('localConfig_v2'); if (!localConfig) throw new Error('Not logged into Slack - localConfig_v2 not found'); const config = JSON.parse(localConfig); const teamId = Object.keys(config.teams)[0]; const token = config.teams[teamId].token; if (!token) throw new Error('Slack token not found'); const chanResp = await fetch('/api/conversations.list?types=public_channel,private_channel&limit=200', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + token, 'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' } }); if (!chanResp.ok) throw new Error('Failed to list channels'); const chanData = await chanResp.json(); const channel = chanData.channels?.find(c => c.name === `{{channel_name}}`); if (!channel) return { success: false, message: 'Channel not found: {{channel_name}}' }; const resp = await fetch('/api/chat.postMessage', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + token, 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ channel: channel.id, text: `{{message}}` }) }); const data = await resp.json(); if (!data.ok) throw new Error('Send failed: ' + data.error); return { success: true, channel: '{{channel_name}}', ts: data.ts }
steps.name: result
steps.label: Send message via Slack API
